metadata.title: Snapshots

confirm-parse-snapshot.description: Parsing this snapshot will consume {points} points. Continue?

confirm-batch-parse.title: Confirm Batch Parse
confirm-batch-parse.description: You have selected {selectedItems} snapshots for parsing, which will consume {totalPoints} points. Continue?
